_comment: PDET Municipalities Detailed Context - 170 municipalities across 16 subregions

_validation_gates.gate_1_scope: Consumers must have 'pdet_context' scope to access this data
_validation_gates.gate_2_value_add: Enables territorial targeting, resource allocation, and policy alignment
_validation_gates.gate_3_capability: Requires geographic analysis and territorial planning capabilities

overview.legal_basis: Acuerdo de Paz Punto 1 + Decreto Ley 893/2017
